mapper.select: SELECT member_no memberNo, member_id memberId, member_email memberEmail, member_name memberName, member_nick memberNick, authority, member_phone memberPhone, member_pw memberPw FROM member WHERE member_id = #{id}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rnum, M.* FROM ( SELECT member_no, member_id, member_name, member_nick , member_email, member_phone, authority FROM member WHERE authority != 4 ORDER BY member_no DESC ) M ) MEMBER WHERE rownum BETWEEN #{startNo } AND #{endNo }

SELECT * FROM member
WHERE 1=1
AND member_id LIKE '%' || #{keyword } || '%'
AND member_nick LIKE '%' || #{keyword } || '%'
AND member_name LIKE '%' || #{keyword } || '%'
ORDER BY member_no DESC
